title: Why Is Soccer Called 'Soccer' Instead Of 'Football'?
description: 7-year-old Kala wants to know why we say soccer in the United States, when the rest of the world calls the game "football." In this episode we hear from people who make their living in the game, professional players, coaches and commentators.
itunes:subtitle: 7-year-old Kala wants to know why we say soccer in the United States, when the rest of the world calls the game "football."
author: questions@butwhykids.org (Vermont Public)
